entry.en: Please try again. If the issue persists, please visit hollowknightsilksong.com/help for more info.
entry.zh: 请再次尝试保存。如果问题仍未解决，请访问 hollowknightsilksong.com/help 获取技术支持。

entry.en: Save file can not be read.
You may try restoring a previous auto save using the option below.
entry.zh: 您可以通过下方选项尝试恢复之前的自动存档。
